title: League Comp Crash
body:
Having problems with League where it will hard-freeze the computer and I must force a power-button reboot. 

I've tried to troubleshoot this on my own, but no idea why it keeps happening. ONLY LEAGUE DOES IT. I've updated my drivers, tried Legacy Client, tried Beta Client. My computer will FREEZE while playing League. Sometimes it happens after a few games, some times after a marathon of them. Is there anybody that might be able to help figure this out?

https://i.imgur.com/N8xgc4u.png

No clue how to delve deeper into this. Event Viewer is just as unhelpful.

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, there was an update which forced the game bar to activate. Sometimes this feature doesn't work so well with certain games and can cause them to not run correctly. You can follow [**this guide**](https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-turn-off-game-bar-windows-10-a.html) for steps on how to disable the game bar.

Let me know if this helps you out!
Just crashed again at the end of a game. It was the 7th game of the night, so no clue what's causing this.

Since you've been through a lot of troubleshooting with our guides already, it sounds like there might be something very specific going on in your case. I'd like you to be able to get some better help one on one with our tech guys. 

If you [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be able to go much more in depth for you!

This has been disabled long ago. I have already run through all the guides available from Riot's Support page but this problem persists with no way to figure out what causes it, if it's one repeating failure or multiple. But all logical inference from experience points to some incompatibility between League and some Windows operation. I was able to play WoW in same or longer sessions with no issues. I've turned the "Share" feature of nVidia and will go a few days to see if maybe that was the reason. But after that, I don't know what else could be causing it, especially since this is the only game I've experience problems with.
